channel.title: Rebuild openvpn package
channel.description:
Hello, having difficulties with user > vpn > tor. Found that solution is: rebuild openvpn package with the --enable-iproute2 option.
Can anyone help how to make this? Tried a lot of stuff downloading packages and ./configure etc stuff... still not solved... also very hard to find prev. versions of Whonix where it was working. Thank you.
